alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Sharkey; Washington; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 8:21PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Washington, northwestern Yazoo, southwestern Humphreys and northern Sharkey Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 820 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Murphy to near Yazoo City. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yazoo City, Hollandale, Anguilla, Darlove, Panther Burn, Nitta Yuma, Delta City, Holly Bluff, Tinsley, Midnight, Murphy, Louise and Satartia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
